channel.title: CVE Feed for Patreon -- Patreon WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Patreon -- Patreon WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-41129|2024-08-02T18:54:04.436Z -- patreon -- patreon%20wordpress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Patreon Patreon WordPress.This issue affects Patreon WordPress: from n/a through 1.8.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-37430|2024-08-02T03:57:38.884Z -- patreon -- patreon%20wordpress
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in Patreon Patreon WordPress allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects Patreon WordPress: from n/a through 1.9.0.
